name: Princess Boy and Little Elephant
description:
A little elephant discovers a book about the brave and beautiful Princess Boy.

This is an early text-only prototype of the game built for Jam For Leelah. The first scene was created during the Global Game Jam.

>>>PLAY ONLINE<<<

Updates:

  1. Sun, Jan 25, 2015: Posted ACT I - SCENE I
  2. Sat, Jan 31, 2015: Posted ACT I - SCENE II
  3. Sun, Feb 22, 2015: Posted ACT I - SCENE III

Princess Boy is on hiatus. Sign up here if you want to get an update in the event that the project is resumed.
